1683750.name: Whimsical Heroes
1683750.description:
In a land once flowing with milk and honey, resources suddenly began to run out. Sensing the impending end of the world as they knew it, the three heroes embark on a journey through unknown lands to uncover the mystery behind this life-sustaining energy crisis.

Defeat your foes in tactical, turn-based battles set on a hexagonal grid. Lead a party of cartoon heroes - the brave bean explorer, the fluffy cat defender, and the onion musician from distant realm - through a series of adventures in Whimsical Heroes!

Core Features

  • Fight diverse tactical turn-based battles - Engage in a variety of combat scenarios with a wide range of characters, bosses, traps, special objects, reinforcement, and events at crucial moments in battle that make each encounter unique.

  • Lead a party of Whimsical Heroes - Each hero has a unique set of skills and roles within the team, offering exciting tactical possibilities.

  • Meet allies and new companions - Companions will join your Camp, allowing you to expand it with new structures and providing powerful skills in next battles.

  • Manage your camp - Your Camp is a safe haven for your heroes, where you can develop your characters and unlock other rewards

  • Influence the fate of your expedition - The world of Whimsical Heroes isn't just about battles. It also features special events that require decision-making, sometimes leading to the discovery of new secret places.

  • Enjoy the unique artistic style - Immerse yourself in a world filled with cats, cheeky cucumbers, talented onions, and various other whimsical creatures. Explore what the world of Whimsical Heroes has to offer!


Story and Adventure Modes

  • Story Mode: Dive into the game's narrative, that allows you to explore the game mechanics and learn about the fates of the main characters and the entire land.

  • Adventure Mode (Inspired by Roguelike systems): Choose three heroes and travel through a land that looks different with each playthrough. Heroes will acquire new skills and encounter various characters, offering fresh challenges every time you play.

Early Access Content

The game is currently in Early Access, which means it is still being developed. In the coming months, we plan to add new content and features, as well as fix bugs and improve overall gameplay.

The current version of the game includes:

  • 30 unique scenes of the first chapter of the Story Mode, which gives you about 2-3 hours of gameplay

  • 29 different scenes with randomly generated encounters and Events in the Adventure Mode

  • 25+ various active and passive skills for your characters to use in battle

  • 10 original enemy types, such as flying Beenut, mighty Cucumberbatch or pumpkin witch Baba-Yaga

  • 3 Heroes - fluffy Cat, onion Bard and brave Beanling

  • 3 Companions - famous travelling Cook, apple connoisseur Hedgehog and nimble Bird

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
